attributes.action: Tell the truth on Global Warming
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has increased taxes hugely on CO2 emmissions, cars, fuel etc in what they call a need to reduce Global Warming. Many scientists have more convincing theories as to why the planet is warming and it is about time the UK government explored the truth rather than exploiting the media hype to increase taxes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
